sentences.sContent: People of all ages should know how to practice safe sex.
sentences.sContent_eng: People of all ages should know how to practice safe sex.
sentences.sCn: 所有年龄段的人都应该知道如何去实践安全性行为。

sentences.sContent: People of all ages are affected, but some groups are more at risk.
sentences.sContent_eng: People of all ages are affected, but some groups are more at risk.
sentences.sCn: 各龄年龄组的人都受影响，但有些年龄组的风险更高。

sentences.sContent: People of all ages ask me if there is something that can be done for them. They hark back to how things used to be.
sentences.sContent_eng: People of all ages ask me if there is something that can be done for them. They hark back to how things used to be.
sentences.sCn: 各个年龄段的人都问我有什么办法可以有效地帮助他们，并且总是重复说他们原来如何如何。
